name: Lars Ekberg
routine: Lars Ekberg typically sleeps by 10:30 pm and wakes at 5:30 am to enjoy a morning run.
occupation: Lars Ekberg is a seasoned architect who works for a firm with strict office hours of 9 am to 5 pm.

lifestyle: Lars follows a minimalistic Scandinavian lifestyle, preferring simple, functional design in both his home and work.
